message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,500. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I really appreciate you coming down a bit.  However, I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to consider $10,500?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to spend closer to $10,000, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm still looking for a price closer to $10,000, so I'm going to offer $10,750.  This is a good middle ground, and I'm hopeful we can reach an agreement.

I understand you're trying to get closer to your target price, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $11,200. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11,200. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
